page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: The block area is predominantly farm- land with two squares containing MOD former World War II airfield. The 2 areas of settlement are Keevil (which is also included in Steeple Ashton block), and Bulkington. This section of Keevil includes part of the village conservation area and contains build- ing contrasts between old and new. Village inhabitants commute to local towns for school, work and amenities eg doctor, bank, shops. A strong com- munity spirit exists with clubs and groups providing a focus for social activity. Fortunately the constantly changing population is fairly evenly spread over the full age range. There are no groups of ethnic minorities resident in the block. The pace of life is slower than in the town but no less hectic. There still exists a pride in keeping the village unspoilt.
